personal.preferred_title: Senior Data Engineer | Capacity Planning & AI-Driven Infrastructure Optimization
personal.address: Murphy, TX (Plano area) / 424 Oriole Dr., Murphy, TX 75094

summary: Senior Data Engineer with over 20 years of enterprise experience, specializing in capacity planning, cloud infrastructure, and automation for high-scale systems. Proficient in designing data modeling solutions and optimizing cloud efficiency for public cloud providers like AWS. Skilled in scripting and building automated ETL pipelines to enhance infrastructure management and cost analytics. Experienced in budgeting and forecasting infrastructure needs with ML tools like Prophet and scikit-learn. Passionate about contributing to Anthropic’s mission of creating safe and beneficial AI systems by ensuring optimal compute capacity and efficiency. Eager to collaborate cross-functionally to drive impactful infrastructure strategies.

flagship_projects.name: Serverless Lakehouse Platform (AWS)
flagship_projects.description: Designed a full serverless data platform using S3, Glue, Athena, and Bedrock. Built a Text-to-SQL GenAI agent with Claude 3 Sonnet. Resolved small file issues with Snappy and Parquet compression. Optimized ETL and data access for enterprise-scale efficiency.

flagship_projects.name: HorizonScale — AI Capacity Forecasting Engine
flagship_projects.description: Replaced legacy manual processes with a parallel generator-based pipeline, reducing forecasting cycles by 90%. Developed an interactive Streamlit dashboard for real-time capacity insights and 'High Trust' utilization scores. Created a modern agentic pipeline for banking-scale telemetry. Repository includes code, documentation, and performance benchmarks.

flagship_projects.name: FAST Project
flagship_projects.description: Conducted data mining of user performance metrics to optimize critical money-generating systems.

experience.title: Senior Capacity & Data Engineer
bullets: Architected automated ETL pipelines using Python and Pandas to ingest P95 telemetry from 6,000+ endpoints, enhancing capacity planning efficiency.
Developed ML forecasting models with Prophet and scikit-learn to predict infrastructure bottlenecks 6 months ahead, improving provisioning accuracy.
Designed optimized Oracle schemas for historical data retention, supporting seasonal risk forecasting and budgeting.
Identified underutilized infrastructure through data mining, driving hardware consolidation and significant cost savings.
Built interactive executive dashboards integrating disparate data feeds for real-time infrastructure insights.
Administered BMC TrueSight for monitoring, configuring thresholds and alerts to optimize capacity management.

experience.title: Performance Engineer
bullets: Managed Dynatrace AppMon/Synthetics for critical systems, ensuring performance monitoring and capacity insights.
Led 'FAST' project to data-mine real-user performance metrics, providing optimization recommendations.
Upgraded Dynatrace (6.5 to 7.0) and supported cloud migration to AWS, enhancing infrastructure efficiency.
Analyzed system bottlenecks and suggested performance improvements for better resource utilization.
Provided end-to-end monitoring and dashboarding for before/after performance metrics.
Integrated Performance Center with Dynatrace for comprehensive capacity analysis.

experience.title: APM Consultant
bullets: Supported enterprise CA APM, CEM, and ADA for utility systems monitoring.
Managed and supported monitoring solutions to ensure infrastructure performance.

experience.title: Senior Consultant / SME for CA APM
bullets: Led large-scale CA APM implementations and upgrades (9.1 to 10.1), managing 4,000–6,000 agents for robust monitoring.
Designed custom Management Modules, dashboards, and alerts to support infrastructure efficiency.
Provided sizing recommendations and bottleneck resolution for J2EE/.NET environments.
Developed Perl/Ksh scripts for data extraction and automation of monitoring processes.
Trained clients on APM solutions, enhancing their capacity to manage infrastructure.
Collaborated with IT teams to troubleshoot performance issues, optimizing resource usage.

experience.title: Performance Test Engineer
bullets: Analyzed J2EE telecom applications to identify load and resource bottlenecks for capacity planning.
Documented critical metrics including JDBC connections, threads, memory, CPU, and GC performance.
Installed JMX, Thread Dumps, and Wily Introscope for detailed infrastructure monitoring.
Created automation scripts to streamline performance testing and capacity analysis.

experience.title: Senior Systems & Data Migration Engineer
bullets: Led migration of 200+ MySQL nodes to a 6-node Oracle RAC cluster for a high-throughput shopping engine.
Optimized C++/OCCI transaction processing, reducing hardware footprint by 95% while maintaining sub-second latency.
Built CPPUNIT testing framework to automate conversion and ensure system reliability.
Enhanced infrastructure efficiency by consolidating resources without compromising performance.

experience.title: Architect/Developer (IRS CADE Project)
bullets: Performed UML-based unit design for a CICS/MQSeries/XML/DB2 system modernization.
Developed modules for IRS infrastructure, ensuring robust data handling.
Worked on messaging architecture with VC++ and DB2 for high reliability.

experience.title: Developer / Support Engineer (Billing, Interfaces, CSM/PRMS)
bullets: Developed high-availability multithreaded C++ interfaces using POSIX and socket programming.
Enhanced billing performance with C/C++/Pro*C/PL/SQL, achieving 75% memory reduction and 10x DB performance.
Automated system administration for WebLogic/WebSphere using Korn Shell scripts.

Troubleshot production issues in CSM and Enabler modules, ensuring system stability.
